    • About Karlyn Ellis


    A Native Californian, Karlyn moved to Texas in 1994 and never looked back. In 1999, she began her career in real estate. After having worked for several different brokerages in town and gaining extensive knowledge of the industry, she decided it was time to start her own brokerage, and that is where Prosper Properties was born! Since its beginning in 2012, Prosper Properties has been a local stand out agency in Hays County, boasting over 30 real estate agents that specialize in the Buda, Kyle, San Marcos and Austin areas. Karlyn and her team have the knowledge, the wisdom and the experience to get your home sold quickly and for maximum profit. Call her today, you will not be disappointed.

    Karlyn Ellis
    Prosper Properties Realty Services
